title: Change product price to ₹20

requirements.text: Update the product price display format to show Indian Rupees (₹) instead of the current currency symbol
acceptanceCriteria: All product prices display with ₹ symbol prefix
Price formatting is consistent across ProductCard, CartItem, Cart, and Checkout pages

requirements.text: Set the default or current product price to 20 rupees (₹20)
acceptanceCriteria: Product price is updated to 20 in the backend data model
Price displays as ₹20 in the frontend

constraints: Preserve existing product data structure and fields
Maintain price as numeric type for calculations
